amendment.description: Amendment allocates $9 million to the Department of Homeland Security to develop a system for real time capabilities assessments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for real time capabilities assessments by $9 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Jindal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
